SEARCH
Package no.ntnu.idatg1002.budgetapplication.backend

Class Expense

java.lang.Object
no.ntnu.idatg1002.budgetapplication.backend.MoneyAction
no.ntnu.idatg1002.budgetapplication.backend.Expense
@Entity public class Expense extends MoneyAction
Represents an expense entry in the budget application. Inherits from the MoneyAction class. An Expense object includes an amount, a description, a recurring type, and an expense category.

    Constructs an Expense object with the specified amount, description, recurring type, expense category, and date of the expense.

  • Constructor Details

    • Expense

      public Expense(int amount, String description, RecurringType type, ExpenseCategory expenseCategory, LocalDate dateAdded)
      Constructs an Expense object with the specified amount, description, recurring type, expense category, and date of the expense.
      Parameters:
      amount - the monetary amount, must be non-negative
      description - a non-empty, non-blank description of the expense
      type - the recurring type of the expense
      expenseCategory - the expense category associated with the expense
      dateAdded - the date of the expense.

    • Expense

      public Expense(int amount, String description, RecurringType type, ExpenseCategory expenseCategory)
      Constructs an Expense object with the specified amount, description, recurring type, and expense category. Sets the date added to current time.
      Parameters:
      amount - the monetary amount, must be non-negative
      description - a non-empty, non-blank description of the expense
      type - the recurring type of the expense
      expenseCategory - the expense category associated with the expense
